plot: Called to the Justice League Watchtower to help in a critical power problem, Static and Gear then have to help stop Brainiac's consciousness from seizing control of the station.
title: "Static Shock" A League of Their Own: Part 1
plot_es: Called to the Justice League Watchtower to help in a critical power problem, Static and Gear then have to help stop Brainiac's consciousness from seizing control of the station.
original_name: "Static Shock" A League of Their Own: Part 1
plot_en: Called to the Justice League Watchtower to help in a critical power problem, Static and Gear then have to help stop Brainiac's consciousness from seizing control of the station.

cast.role: Static /              Virgil Hawkins /              Green Lantern /              John Stewart
cast.name: Phil LaMarr
